root.message: The REL_CAL_POLICY field for indicator 2-2-2b, translated into en
root.data: The UNICEF-WHO-WB Joint Child Malnutrition (JME) group releases country, regional and worldwide estimates at the end of March every other years so that data are available for the SDG report and database. The JME group also maintain a database of primary data sources (e.g., household surveys), which is updated every six months, and used to generate the JME global and regional estimates.
